genetic

Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • genetic.Population

  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of individuals for the genetic algorithm.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String[] individuals
      The individuals in the population.
      static double MUTATION_RATE
      The expected number of mutations per individual.
      static int POOL_SIZE
      In choose(), this many BitStrings are chosen at random and the best one is returned.
      private FitnessFunction problem
      The problem being solved.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Population(FitnessFunction problem, int size, int length) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double averageFitness()
      Returns the average fitness of the population.
      int bestFitness()
      Returns the fitness of the most fit individual in the population.
      java.lang.String choose()
      Returns a fit individual.
      void evolve()
      Performs one generation of evolution, modifying this population.
      (package private) void setIndividual(int i, java.lang.String individual)
      Puts individual in this population at index i.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Population

        public Population(FitnessFunction problem,
          int size,
          int length)
        Parameters:
        problem - The problem being solved.
        size - The number of individuals per generation.
        length - The length of each individual.

    • Method Detail

      • averageFitness

        public double averageFitness()
        Returns the average fitness of the population.

      • bestFitness

        public int bestFitness()
        Returns the fitness of the most fit individual in the population.

      • choose

        public java.lang.String choose()
        Returns a fit individual. Specifically, chooses several individuals at random and returns the fittest one.

      • evolve

        public void evolve()
        Performs one generation of evolution, modifying this population.

      • setIndividual

        void setIndividual(int i,
                 java.lang.String individual)
        Puts individual in this population at index i. For testing only.
